name: SKL Kommentus AB
memberOrga: SKL Kommentus is owned by the Swedish Association of Local Authorities and Regions (SALAR). Webbsite:www.skr.se
goal: Provide framework agreements, training and consultancy services in the area of public procurement and public purchasing.
euInitiatives: Expert in European Commission stakeholder Group on Public Procurement aiding and helping in the development of EU policies in the area of Public Procurement. We are interested in the development of remedies and the interpretation of the "new" public procurement directives.
